definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: If I knew his address, I could write him.
sentences.chinese: 辱果我知道他的住址，斡会写信给他。

sentences.english: We thank many listeners who write to us and encourage us.
sentences.chinese: 很感谢有不少听友写信来给我们，鼓励我们。

sentences.english: Speak, write, pray, and love the children entrusted to me.
sentences.chinese: 讲说，写信，祈祷，爱所有信任我的孩子。

sentences.english: For further information write to the above address.
sentences.chinese: 若需了解进一步的情况，请写信至以上地址。

sentences.english: Queen Elizabeth wrote to the Earl of Moray.
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白女王写信给马里伯爵。

sentences.english: A typewritten date is nece arily included in the heading.
sentences.chinese: 写信日期是信头的必要组成部分。

sentences.english: Use the less dominant hand to move your computer mouse or write a letter.
sentences.chinese: 用较少用的手来操纵鼠标或写信。

sentences.english: So I wrote enquires to two colleges, but both replied that their students quotas were already full. (semantic addition)
sentences.chinese: 我就写信去问两个学院，回信都说学额早满了。

sentences.english: A few years before Herod's death Augustus wrote to him.
sentences.chinese: 几年前希律的死亡奥古斯都写信给他。

sentences.english: I Tertius, who wrote this epistle, salute you in the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 我这代笔写信的德丢，在主里面问你们安。

sentences.english: And all the brethren which are with me, unto the churches of Galatia
sentences.chinese: 和一切与我同在的众弟兄，写信给加拉太的各教会。

sentences.english: This should arouse the attention of the addresser.
sentences.chinese: 这一点应该引起写信人的注意。

sentences.english: I’ll write to our home office to waive our claim immediately.
sentences.chinese: 我立即写信给我们的总公司提出放弃索赔。

sentences.english: Why did you write to his office?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么写信给他的办公室？

sentences.english: She doesn't often write to her family, only once a month.
sentences.chinese: 她不常给家里写信，仅一月一封而已。

sentences.english: He'd barely come home when he whaled into me for not writing to him.
sentences.chinese: 他一回家就责怪我不给他写信。

definition: to reply/to write back/letter written in reply/CL:封[feng1]
to send word/to deliver a letter
